channel.title: Fluke Mini-Comics and Zine Festival
channel.description:
**FLUKE** Mini-Comics and Zine Festival will showcase the work of over 30 different artists, comics and writers on Saturday, March 28 at the 40 Watt Club, here in Athens, GA.
It is a great place to get inspired and meet a lot of creative folk without the stress of a gigantic con.
FLUKE [website](https://flukeisawesome.blogspot.com/)
[Local Press Article](https://www.redandblack.com/culture/fluke-mini-comics-and-zine-festival-to-exhibit-small-press/article_4f2b449e-6277-11ea-b616-2bedfdccb1fc.html)

item.title: Fluke Mini-Comics and Zine Festival
item.dc:creator: @chrisshorb
item.description:
@chrisshorb wrote:

Ditto. This would be exactly the kind of event I would like to attend.

Maybe I’ll need to do same here in “university town” California.
